obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_119_: * K. ROUND felt stressed out and attacked!/%
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_226_: * K. ROUND's HP and ATTACK went up!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_228_: * Susie^1! Stop attacking it^1! You're making it stronger!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_230_: * Pssh^1, and let it think I'm AFRAID^1? No way!/%
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_263_: * K.ROUND - AT 9 DF 3&* Check^1?&* That's chess^1, not checkers!/%
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_277_: * K.ROUND - AT 9 DF 3&* Watch out for its Flying King attack!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_278_: * (Also^1, you need to get the CROWN off of its head.)/%
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_282_: * K.ROUND - AT 9 DF 3&* It's being controlled into attacking...!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_327_: * It bowed back^1.&* Its crown loosened a little./%
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_330_: * It bowed back^1.&* Its crown loosened a little./
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_332_: * That's it^1, Kris^1! If we can get its crown off.../
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_333_: \E8* It should turn back into a little guy...!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_334_: \E0* Susie^1! Help us bow at it!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_337_: \E4* When I smash this guy into the GROUND!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_350_: \E1* How can we push off that CROWN...?/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_370_: \E6* It'll be hard^1, but we can do it!!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_442_: * K. ROUND bowed back^1.&* Its crown loosened!/%
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_445_: * K. ROUND bowed back^1.&* Its crown loosened!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_447_: * That's it^1, Kris^1! If we can get its crown off.../
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_448_: \E8* It should turn back into a little guy...!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_449_: \E0* Susie^1! Help us bow at it!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_452_: \E4* When I smash this guy to the GROUND!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_510_: * Susie^1? You want to ACT^1? Aww, what's your idea?/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_512_: * Umm..^1. well..^1. how do I say this./
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_513_: * I kind of..^1.&* Need you for this one./
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_516_: \E0* You want to apologize to it for earlier^1, right?/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_518_: * Nah^1, I just need you to stay still./%
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_531_: * You explained to K. Round about the importance of dodging Susie's attacks./
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_532_: * But it didn't seem to understand.../%
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_535_: * You started making siren noises with your mouth and looking at Susie./
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_540_: * You started explaining that Susie is really dangerous and strong./
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_541_: * Susie got a large boost to her morale./
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_578_: * Kris^1! We gotta get that CROWN off its head!/
obj_checkers_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_579_: * Help me throw Ralsei at it!/%
